product_name: The North Face Masonic Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for hiking, climbing or roaming around town, the Masonic Hoodie by The North Face has a sleek fit and modern lines, and is made with soft, lightweight Polartec(R) microfleece. Pill-resistant Polartec(R) Classic 100 microfleece provides warmth without the weight and bulk of traditional fleece. The North Face TKA Masonic hoodie breathes well to provide comfort for a wide range of activities and dries quickly to minimize heat loss. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection. Features full-length zipper, hand pockets and media-friendly pocket with loop. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for hiking, climbing or roaming around town, the Masonic Hoodie by The North Face has a sleek fit and modern lines, and is made with soft, lightweight Polartec(R) microfleece.
